Package me.kverna.roger.server.security

Class JwtManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kverna.roger.server.security.JwtManager
  • @Component
public class JwtManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles signing and verification of JSON web tokens. This component is instantiated with a secret key loaded using the secret defined in the JwtProperties, or generated using the specified secret algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • createExpiration

        private java.util.Date createExpiration()
        Returns a new expiration date. The days until expiration should be defined in the properties.
        Returns:
        a new expiration date

      • generateToken

        public java.lang.String generateToken​(java.lang.String subject)
        Generates a signed JSON web token using the given subject. The token will have an expiration date as per createExpiration.
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject to add to the token
        Returns:
        a signed JSON web token

      • getSubject

        public java.lang.String getSubject​(java.lang.String token)
        Verify a JSON web token and return the subject if it is valid and has not expired.
        Parameters:
        token - the JSON web token to verify
        Returns:
        the subject if the token is valid or null
